description.lang: Meet Scout.A new breed of home security.Ridiculously easy setup.HASSLE-FREENo holes in your walls. No tools necessary. No need to miss work to let strangers into your home. Get the entire Scout system up and running yourself in minutes.Be aware. Anywhere.MOBILE ACCESSControl your entire Scout system from any mobile device. Get live updates when anything is out of the ordinary. Monitor any room, from anywhere.Designed for you.ONE SIZE DOESN'T FIT ALLScout meets your home security needs in style. Rent a small studio? Your ideal Scout system secures your whole home with only a few sensors. With Scout, only buy what you need to feel safe.Protected and connected.NETWORK OF DEVICESScout is a system of sensors that communicate with each other to provide complete protection, customized for your home.
